name: Eric Allender
content: Home Page for Eric Allender Eric Allender Distinguished Professor Emeritus Department of Computer Science Rutgers, the State University of NJ 110 Frelinghuysen Road Piscataway, NJ 08854-8019 USA Email: allender@cs.rutgers.edu My research centers on questions in complexity theory, including circuit complexity, Kolmogorov complexity, resource-bounded measure theory, and properties of complexity classes. Academic Information Research Publications Complexity Theory Lecture Notes (See also highly unprofessional activities.) Click here, here, here, here, or here to see my picture. Related Links at Rutgers DIMACS CS-Theory Seminar. (Also, information on prior semesters.) Theoretical Computer Science at Rutgers Department of Mathematics DIMACS
